Title: Wazir
Writer: Vidhu Vinod Chopra (story), Vidhu Vinod Chopra (screenplay), Abhijat Joshi (screenplay), Bejoy Nambiar (screenplay), Natasha Sahgal (screenplay), Shubhra Marfatia (screenplay), Abhijeet Shirish Deshpande (dialogue), Gazal Dhaliwal (dialogue), Shubhra Swarup (Script Associate)
Actors: Amitabh Bachchan, Farhan Akhtar, Aditi Rao Hydari, Manav Kaul
Plot: A grief-stricken cop and an amputee grandmaster are brought together by a peculiar twist of fate as part of a wider conspiracy that has darkened their lives.
